amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to establish caps on discretionary spending from FY2010 through FY2014 and a cap on total spending as a percentage of gross domestic product. It also sought to put in place maximum limits on deficits through 2019, also as a percentage of gross domestic product.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in Part C of House Report 111-217 to establish caps on discretionary spending from FY2010 through FY2014 and a cap on total spending as a percentage of gross domestic product. It would also put in place maximum limits on deficits through 2019, again as a percentage of gross domestic product.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Ryan (WI).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryan (WI) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 259 (Roll no. 610).
